name: Fried Eggplant, Mirliton or Zucchini
description: Vegetables dredged in seasoned flour and bread crumbs and fried until golden brown.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup peeled and coarsely chopped raw eggplant or 1/2 zucchini, or 1 cup peeled and coarsely chopped cooked mirliton
1/2 cup very fine dry bread crumbs

recipeInstructions.1: Combine the seasoning mix ingredients in a small bowl, mixing thoroughly.

recipeInstructions.2: Sprinkle the vegetables evenly with about 1/2 teaspoon of the mix.

recipeInstructions.3: Place the flour in a small bowl and the bread crumbs in another.

recipeInstructions.4: Add 1 teaspoon of the seasoning mix to the flour and 1 teaspoon to the bread crumbs, mixing each well.

recipeInstructions.5: In a separate small bowl combine the milk and egg until well blended.

recipeInstructions.6: Heat 1 inch oil in a 2-quart saucepan or deep fryer to 350 degrees.

recipeInstructions.7: Just before frying, dredge the chopped vegetables in the seasoned flour, shaking off excess.

recipeInstructions.8: Coat well with the milk mixture, and then quickly with the bread crumbs, shaking off excess.

recipeInstructions.9: Cook vegetables in the hot oil until dark golden brown, about 2 to 3 minutes, making sure to separate vegetable pieces as you drop them into the oil.

recipeInstructions.10: Drain on paper towels and serve immediately.

recipeInstructions.11: If serving eggplant or zucchini, sprinkle lightly with powdered sugar if desired.

name: Southern Biscuit Muffins
description: Muffins with a thick crust and a cakelike center.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 pound (1 stick) plus 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened

recipeInstructions.1: In a bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt; mix well, breaking up any lumps.

recipeInstructions.2: Work the butter in by hand until the mixture resembles coarse cornmeal, making sure no lumps are left.

recipeInstructions.3: Gradually stir in the milk, mixing just until dry ingredients are moistened. Do not overbeat.

recipeInstructions.4: Spoon the batter into 12 greased muffin cups.

recipeInstructions.5: Bake at 350 degrees until golden brown, about 35 to 40 minutes.

name: Banana Bread or Muffins
description: A tasty recipe for overripe bananas with black skins.
recipeIngredient: 3/8 pound (1 1/2 sticks) unsalted butter, melted and cooled
3 tablespoons buttermilk (or a mixture of 3 tablespoons milk and 1/2 teaspoon vinegar set out for 1 hour)
1 cup coarsely chopped pecans, dry roasted

recipeInstructions.1: In a large bowl combine the bananas, sugar and eggs with a spoon until well blended.

recipeInstructions.2: Gradually add the butter, mixing well.

recipeInstructions.3: Stir in the flour and baking soda until well mixed and creamy.

recipeInstructions.4: Stir in the buttermilk, then fold in the pecans.

recipeInstructions.5: For the bread: Spoon batter into two 8 1/2 x 4 1/2-inch greased loaf pans. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes, then reduce heat to 300 degrees and bake until dark brown and cooked through, about 45 minutes. [cite: 90, 91]

recipeInstructions.6: For the muffins: Spoon batter into 12 greased muffin cups. Bake at 300 degrees until dark brown and done, about 65 minutes. [cite: 93, 94]

name: Bran Muffins
description: Hearty bran muffins with raisins and molasses.
recipeIngredient: 2 small eggs or 1 large egg, beaten

recipeInstructions.1: In a medium-size bowl combine the milk, raisins, egg(s), molasses and vanilla; let sit 45 minutes. [cite: 109]

recipeInstructions.2: Combine the dry ingredients in a large bowl, mixing well and breaking up any lumps. [cite: 110]

recipeInstructions.3: Fold milk mixture into the dry ingredients with a rubber spatula just until flour is thoroughly incorporated; do not overmix. [cite: 111]

recipeInstructions.4: Spoon into 12 greased muffin cups. Bake at 300 degrees until well browned, about 1 hour. [cite: 112]

recipeInstructions.5: Remove from pan immediately and serve while still hot. [cite: 113]

name: Carrot Muffins or Bread
description: Best served allowed to sit uncovered about 2 hours before serving.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup coarsely chopped pecans or walnuts, dry roasted
1/4 pound (1 stick) unsalted butter, melted and cooled

recipeInstructions.1: Combine the flour, sugar, carrots, nuts, baking powder, cinnamon and salt in a large bowl; mix thoroughly with a spoon. [cite: 127]

recipeInstructions.2: Add the remaining ingredients and mix just until blended; do not overbeat. [cite: 128]

recipeInstructions.3: For the muffins: Spoon batter into 12 greased muffin cups. Bake at 350 degrees until golden brown and tops spring back when gently touched, about 45 minutes. [cite: 130, 131]

recipeInstructions.4: For the bread: Spoon batter into a greased 8 1/2 x 4 1/2-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees until dark golden brown and done, about 1 hour 30 minutes. [cite: 134, 135]

name: Cornbread or Cornbread Muffins
description: Sweet Cajun style cornbread.

recipeInstructions.1: In a large bowl combine the flour, cornmeal, sugar, corn flour, baking powder, and salt; mix well. [cite: 156]

recipeInstructions.2: In a separate bowl combine the milk, butter and egg and add to the dry ingredients; blend just until mixed and large lumps are dissolved. Do not overbeat. [cite: 157, 158]

recipeInstructions.3: For bread: Pour mixture into a greased 8x8-inch baking pan and bake at 350 degrees until golden brown, about 55 minutes. [cite: 159]

recipeInstructions.4: For muffins: Spoon mixture into 12 greased muffin cups. Bake at 350 degrees until golden brown, about 45 minutes. [cite: 161]

name: Honey Bread
description: Yeast bread sweetened with honey.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon honey in all
About 5 1/2 cups all-purpose flour in all
3 tablespoons pork lard, chicken fat or vegetable oil

recipeInstructions.1: In a medium-size bowl stir 1 tablespoon of the honey into the water until dissolved. Stir in the yeast and let sit until dissolved, about 10 minutes. [cite: 174, 175]

recipeInstructions.2: Sift 4 1/2 cups of the flour and the salt into a large bowl. [cite: 176]

recipeInstructions.3: In a saucepan bring the milk, lard and butter to a boil; reduce heat and cook until reduced to 1 cup. [cite: 177, 178]

recipeInstructions.4: Stir the hot liquid into the flour. Add the yeast mixture and beat until well mixed. Stir in remaining 1/2 cup honey. [cite: 179, 180]

recipeInstructions.5: Knead dough on floured surface until smooth and elastic (about 10 mins). [cite: 181]

recipeInstructions.6: Let rise in a greased bowl until doubled (30-45 mins). [cite: 182, 183]

recipeInstructions.7: Punch down, divide into 3 portions, form loaves, and place in pans. [cite: 185, 186]

recipeInstructions.8: Let rise again until almost doubled. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes. [cite: 188, 189]

name: New Orleans Black Muffins
description: Dark muffins made with molasses and whole wheat flour.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups coarsely chopped pecans, dry roasted

recipeInstructions.1: Combine hot water and molasses; stir in milk. [cite: 209]

recipeInstructions.2: Sift together flours, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt. [cite: 210]

recipeInstructions.3: Fold liquid mixture and pecans into dry ingredients just until flour is incorporated. [cite: 212]

recipeInstructions.4: Spoon into 12 greased muffin cups. [cite: 213]

recipeInstructions.5: Bake at 300 degrees for 45 minutes to 1 hour. [cite: 214]

name: Mama's Yeast Bread or Rolls
description: Classic homemade yeast bread or rolls.
recipeIngredient: About 7 cups all-purpose flour, in all
1/4 cup pork lard or vegetable oil

recipeInstructions.1: Mix 6 cups flour, 5 tablespoons sugar and salt. [cite: 216]

recipeInstructions.2: Combine yeast, remaining sugar and hot water. Let sit 5-10 mins. [cite: 216]

recipeInstructions.3: Add lard to liquid mixture. Add half liquid to flour; mix. [cite: 217, 218]

recipeInstructions.4: Add remainder of liquid. Knead until smooth and elastic, adding flour as needed. [cite: 219, 220]

recipeInstructions.5: Let rise until doubled (about 1 hour). Punch down. [cite: 220]

recipeInstructions.6: For bread: Form 3 loaves, place in pans, rise again. Bake at 325 degrees for 45-50 mins. Brush with butter. [cite: 221, 225]

recipeInstructions.7: For rolls: Make 1 1/2 inch balls, place in pan, rise. Bake as for bread. [cite: 227]

name: Jalapeño and Cheese Bread or Rolls
description: Spicy cheese bread.
recipeIngredient: About 8 cups all-purpose flour, in all
2 tablespoons plus 2 teaspoons pork lard or vegetable oil

recipeInstructions.1: Combine 7 cups flour, cheese, peppers, 7 tbsp sugar and salt. [cite: 235]

recipeInstructions.2: Combine water, yeast and remaining sugar. Let sit 10 mins. [cite: 236]

recipeInstructions.3: Add lard to liquid. Mix liquid into flour mixture. [cite: 238]

recipeInstructions.4: Knead until smooth and elastic. Let rise until doubled (1 hour). [cite: 242]

recipeInstructions.5: Punch down. Form loaves or rolls. [cite: 245]

recipeInstructions.6: Let rise again. Bake at 325 degrees until dark brown (about 1 hour for bread). [cite: 249]

name: Crêpes
description: Basic crêpe batter.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup plus 1 tablespoon sifted all-purpose flour

recipeInstructions.1: Combine milk, eggs, oil, sugar, nutmeg and salt; mix well with a whisk. [cite: 256]

recipeInstructions.2: Add flour and whisk until blended and no lumps remain. [cite: 256]

recipeInstructions.3: Heat oiled crepe pan. Pour 2 tablespoons batter, tilt to coat. [cite: 258, 260]

recipeInstructions.4: Cook until golden brown (30 secs to 1 min); brown only one side. [cite: 261]

name: Blackened Redfish
description: Classic Cajun blackened fish dish.
recipeIngredient: 6 (8- to 10-ounce) fish fillets (preferably redfish, pompano or tilefish), cut about 1/2 inch thick

recipeInstructions.1: Heat a large cast-iron skillet over very high heat until smoking. [cite: 267]

recipeInstructions.2: Dip each fillet in melted butter, then sprinkle seasoning mix generously on both sides. [cite: 266]

recipeInstructions.3: Place in hot skillet; pour 1 teaspoon melted butter on top of fillet. [cite: 277]

recipeInstructions.4: Cook uncovered until charred (about 2 minutes). Turn, pour butter on top, cook until done. [cite: 276]

name: Seafood Dirty Rice
description: Traditional dirty rice made with seafood.
recipeIngredient: 1 3/4 pounds small shrimp with heads and shells
2 1/2 tablespoons very finely chopped green bell peppers
3/4 cup very finely chopped green onions

recipeInstructions.1: Peel shrimp and make stock with heads/shells. [cite: 278]

recipeInstructions.2: Melt butter with oil. Add tomato sauce, veg and seasonings; sauté 5 mins. [cite: 280, 281]

recipeInstructions.3: Add stock; cook on high 10 mins. [cite: 282]

recipeInstructions.4: Stir in cream, simmer 4 mins. [cite: 283]

recipeInstructions.6: Stir in rice, green onions and crabmeat. Heat through. [cite: 284]

name: Seafood Crêpes
description: Crêpes filled with rich seafood cream sauce.

recipeInstructions.1: Combine seasoning mix. [cite: 289]

recipeInstructions.2: Melt butter; sauté onions and green onions. [cite: 286]

recipeInstructions.3: Add seasoning mix, then flour. Stir in cream. [cite: 286]

recipeInstructions.4: Add crawfish and shrimp; simmer 3-4 mins. [cite: 287]

name: Fish with Pecan Butter Sauce and Meunière Sauce
description: Pan fried fish topped with two sauces and pecans.
recipeIngredient: 6 (4-ounce) trout, redfish or other firm fish fillets
6 tablespoons coarsely chopped pecans, dry roasted

recipeInstructions.1: Make Pecan Butter Sauce and Meunière Sauce. [cite: 292]

recipeInstructions.2: Combine milk and egg. [cite: 290]

recipeInstructions.3: Combine seasonings. Add 1 tbsp seasoning to flour. [cite: 289]

recipeInstructions.4: Sprinkle remaining seasoning on fish. [cite: 289]

recipeInstructions.5: Dredge fish in seasoned flour, coat in egg mix, then flour again. [cite: 298]

recipeInstructions.6: Fry in hot oil until golden. [cite: 297]

recipeInstructions.7: Serve topped with Meunière Sauce, then Pecan Butter Sauce, and pecans. [cite: 296, 299]

name: Pecan Butter Sauce
description: Rich butter sauce with pecans.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup coarsely chopped pecans, dry roasted

recipeInstructions.1: Place all ingredients in a blender or food processor. [cite: 295]

recipeInstructions.2: Process until creamy and smooth, about 2 to 3 minutes. [cite: 295]

name: Fried Catfish with Hushpuppies
description: Classic fried catfish served with hushpuppies.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup Creole mustard or brown mustard

recipeInstructions.1: Combine seasoning mix. [cite: 301]

recipeInstructions.2: Combine 1 1/2 tsp mix with 1 cup flour in one pan. [cite: 302]

recipeInstructions.3: Combine 2 tbsp + 1 tsp mix with remaining flour, cornmeal and corn flour in another pan. [cite: 303]

recipeInstructions.4: Beat milk, eggs and mustard in a third pan. [cite: 304]

recipeInstructions.6: Dredge fish in flour, then egg mixture, then cornmeal mixture. [cite: 307]

recipeInstructions.7: Fry in hot oil (350 degrees) until golden brown. [cite: 308]

name: Hushpuppies
description: Deep fried cornmeal dumplings.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup very finely chopped green onions
2 tablespoons pork lard or oil, heated

recipeInstructions.1: Combine dry ingredients, green onions and garlic. [cite: 312]

recipeInstructions.2: Add eggs. [cite: 313]

recipeInstructions.3: Heat milk and lard to a boil; add to mixture. [cite: 314, 315]

recipeInstructions.4: Refrigerate 1 hour. [cite: 316]

recipeInstructions.5: Drop batter by tablespoonfuls into hot oil (350 degrees). Fry until golden. [cite: 317, 318]

name: Sautéed Seafood Platter with Meunière Sauce
description: Pan fried fish, sautéed crabmeat, shrimp and oysters.
recipeIngredient: Seasoning mix (salt, paprika, white pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, red pepper, thyme, black pepper, oregano)

recipeInstructions.1: Pan fry the fish fillets using seasoned flour and egg wash. [cite: 327, 329]

recipeInstructions.2: Sauté crabmeat in butter with onions, parsley and seasoning. [cite: 332]

recipeInstructions.3: Sauté shrimp in butter with onions, parsley and seasoning. [cite: 335]

recipeInstructions.4: Sauté oysters in butter with onions and seasoning. [cite: 337]

recipeInstructions.5: Serve fish topped with crabmeat, surrounded by shrimp and oysters, with Meunière Sauce. [cite: 339]

name: Seafood Stuffed Whole Fish
description: Whole fish stuffed with a rich seafood stuffing.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup very fine dry bread crumbs
6 whole fish (trout, redfish), cleaned and boned
Salt, white pepper, milk for wash

recipeInstructions.1: Make stuffing: sauté vegetables, add seafood, bread crumbs, butter, egg and cheese. Chill. [cite: 345, 347, 348, 351]

recipeInstructions.2: Stuff fish with cold stuffing. [cite: 356]

recipeInstructions.3: Dredge fish in seasoned flour, dip in milk wash, dredge again. [cite: 358]

recipeInstructions.4: Fry fish until brown. Finish baking in oven at 350 degrees. [cite: 371]

name: Seafood Stuffed Flounder
description: Flounder stuffed with cheddar and seafood mixture, then baked.

recipeInstructions.1: Make stuffing: Fry bacon/veg. Add shrimp/seasoning. Add stock/oysters. Puree partially. Make roux sauce, add to stuffing. Add cheese/green onions. [cite: 379, 380, 383, 386]

recipeInstructions.2: Stuff flounder with cheddar and seafood stuffing. [cite: 388, 389]

recipeInstructions.3: Bread bottom of flounder. [cite: 394]

recipeInstructions.4: Fry bottom in skillet. Bake at 550 degrees until done. [cite: 395, 397]

description: Fried eggplant pirogues filled with seafood sauce.

recipeInstructions.4: Make seafood filling with crab, shrimp, Pernod and the prepared sauce. [cite: 416, 419]

recipeInstructions.5: Serve seafood mixture in fried eggplant shells. [cite: 422]

description: Baked stuffed eggplant topped with a creamy shrimp sauce.

recipeInstructions.1: Parboil eggplants. Scoop out pulp. [cite: 428, 430]

recipeInstructions.2: Make stuffing with pulp, vegetables, stock and seasonings. Bake stuffing. [cite: 432, 434]

recipeInstructions.3: Add seafood to stuffing. Bake again. [cite: 435]

recipeInstructions.4: Serve topped with Shrimp Butter Cream Sauce. [cite: 435]

description: Fried stuffed zucchini balls served with sauce.

recipeInstructions.1: Hollow zucchini. [cite: 448]

recipeInstructions.3: Stuff zucchini shells. Bake. [cite: 462]

recipeInstructions.6: Serve stuffed shells with fried balls and sauce. [cite: 474]

description: Mirlitons stuffed with seafood dressing.

recipeInstructions.4: Serve mirlitons filled with stuffing and topped with sauce. [cite: 488]

recipeInstructions.1: Make sauce: sauté veg/spices, add cream, sour cream, cheese. [cite: 493, 495, 496]

recipeInstructions.2: Sauté crawfish. Add cheese sauce. [cite: 499, 500]

recipeInstructions.3: Dip tortillas in hot oil. [cite: 503]

recipeInstructions.4: Fill tortillas with mixture, roll, top with sauce and cheese. [cite: 504, 507]

name: Crawfish (or Shrimp) Etouffée
description: Rich Cajun stew with crawfish or shrimp.

recipeInstructions.1: Make dark roux with oil and flour. [cite: 516, 517]

recipeInstructions.2: Add vegetables to roux. [cite: 518]
